description.value:
Immune to effect of gases and can breath underwater, has 1 hour of air in a connected canister. Replacing canister takes a Full Action. Good Craftsmanship lasts 2 Hours, Poor takes 2 Full Actions to replace.

Requirements

Replacement Canisters are Scarce Availability.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 50 T
